# Government Notice

## Notice Title
**Truck and Custom Build Box Acquisition**

## Reference Number
WS4453522195-Doc4453657401

## Amendment Number
[2nd Amendment issued on April 2nd, 2024]

## Solicitation Number
 WS4453522195

## Publication and Closing Dates
* Published: April 2nd, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 24th, 2024 (14:00 EST)

## Notice Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) require the acquisition of three (3) customized light trucks or sport utility vehicles to support their operations. Two (2) trucks will be used for Stream 1 and one (1) for Stream 2.

## Contract Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Information
The trucks are intended for use by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) at their national headquarters in Ottawa, Ontario.

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact Stephanie Way, SPAC/PSPC, at stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Regions of Opportunity: No restriction
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewan

[Retrieve the tender documents from https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19280554](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19280554)
